description:
Gao and friends are worried about Kanata`s strange behavior. Chibi Panda wants to become stronger to protect Gao and Batzz. Guru Bunbuku tries to solve both problems through a Buddyfight with Gao.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Batzz`s Overturn! Thunder Empire Formation Complete!
バッツ逆天! 雷帝フォーメーション完成!!
